A '''poisonous potato head block''' is a joke [[block]] added in [[24w14potato]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
A poisonous potato head block can be mined using any item and drops itself when broken.
{{breaking row|horizontal=1|Poisonous Potato Head Block}}

=== Natural generation ===
Poisonous potato head blocks naturally generate in the [[potato dimension]].{{More info}}

=== Piston interactivity ===
If a poisonous potato head block is pushed by a [[piston]], it breaks off as an [[item (entity)|item]]. It can't be pulled by [[sticky piston]]s.
